I spend 7 seven to 9 hours of PC/Internet use per day.
How much do you spend.
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5510b8cc63687231dbba0000#post_5510b8cc63687231dbba0000
I work/commute average 10-12 hours a day
I usually use my phone for internet during breaks and the drive home, so at least an hour or two then
I usually go to bed at 11, so I spend at least 6 hours at home

And weekends are mostly just internet
